title: GREAT 1155sqft 2 bedroom 2 bathroom loft with premium garage
description: Upon entering this stunning residence, you'll immediately appreciate the utmost privacy and tranquility of this rarely available, 1155sqft 2 bedroom 2 bathroom loft with premium garage parking included, perched on a high upon the 9th floor of the iconic Hudson Tea Building. With its open concept "butterfly" layout, soaring 14-foot lofted ceilings with exposed concrete beams, and expansive, unobstructed views north up to the GW Bridge, and east of the Hudson River, Hudson Yards & NYC from your 10-foot picture windows allow for natural light all day. This thoughtfully upgraded home has a spacious, open chef's kitchen perfect for entertaining, featuring a massive quartz breakfast bar with endless counter space, plentiful seating for 4 or more, 42" custom wood cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting, and a custom subway tile backsplash. The adjacent dining area easily fits a table of 6 to host the most incredible dinner parties and opens up to the living area for optimal space. On each wing of the loft, you'll find two generously sized bedrooms, both easily fitting a king bed, with custom window shades, two large closets in each, full baths attached, & the primary includes an updated en-suite bath with linen closet. This stylish loft, Residence 9O, is further enhanced by chic, all-natural hardwood floors, overhead lighting, full-size in-unit washer/dryer, and slate tiled entryway foyer complete with coat closet that rounds out this incredible space. In house storage & bicycle storage offered by HTB for a nominal monthly fee. The Hudson Tea's full-service amenities suite includes 24 hour concierge, nearly 3000 sqft gym with included fitness classes (adult & kids yoga, barre & HIIT classes, offered virtually), kids' redesigned playroom & resident lounge coming soon, 3 modernized high-speed elevators, FREE shuttle to and from PATH, dry cleaner, & Choc O Pain French café onsite! Brand New modern lobby/lounge/WFH space included! Located directly on the Uptown Hudson River waterfront, neighboring Shipyard/Maxwell Park, vibrant boutique shopping & outdoor eateries, Direct Ferry to Midtown & WFC, Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, and the Uptown farmer's market. With parking included all the boxes are surely checked. FOR A FASTER RESPONSE PLEASE EMAIL WITH THE NUMBER show contact info

title: Your modern kitchen is beautiful and equipped with white shaker cabine
description:
Welcome to #1R! This is a stunning bi-level 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom unit with private outdoor space, hardwood floors, modern finishes, recessed lighting, central air, in-unit laundry and a shared roofdeck! Enter through a private entrance to a dynamic living space that can accommodate a variety of furniture arrangements. Your modern kitchen is beautiful and equipped with white shaker cabinets, ample prep space, white tile backsplash and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, overhead microwave, oven/stove and refrigerator. Your 1st full bathroom offers a lighted vanity, fully tiled shower stall and stacked washer and dryer for added convenience. Continue your tour downstairs with your 2 spacious bedrooms, each with natural light and good closet space. There is another full bathroom on this level with a vanity for storage and a beautiful tiled shower stall. You will have a private patio out back - perfect for grilling in the warmer months! There is also a large, shared roof deck with beautiful views of the city - schedule your tour today!* Please note photos are of similar units in the building; Exact format and finish may vary. About The Neighborhood: Francisville is a nice, residential neighborhood near Girard College. Nearby are Temple University, The Met Philadelphia, Columbia North YMCA, Girard College and Eastern State Penitentiary. Nearby Girard Avenue, Ridge Avenue, and Fairmount Avenue offer countless dining, shopping and public transportation options. Walking distance to Francisville Playground, Ogden Park and The Spring Gardens. You'll be close to great local spots like Cambridge Street Coffee House, Bar Hygge, Thirsty Dice, Vineyards Cafe, Urban Salon, Bold Coffee Bar and more!
For more information, send your personal number contact Jocelyn Velasquez

title: Martin Street- 3 bedroom, 2 bath row home with OFF STREET PARKING!!!
description: Welcome to 375 Martin Street- 3 bedroom, 2 bath row home with OFF STREET PARKING!!! This beautiful home is located within walking distance to all that Mainstreet Manayunk and the Ridge has to offer. Step inside from your front porch to your cozy and bright living room featuring beautiful Brazilian Cherry hardwood floors and charming millwork that run through your formal dining room. title: CENTER CITY PHILADELPHIA APT NEAR RITTENHOUSE SQ BE A PART OF HISTORY
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃ‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **
1616 Walnut St #1B-2003

title: MODERN FINISHES, SKYLINE VIEWS AND AN INCREDIBLE LOCATION!
description:
Welcome to 815 Perkiomen St #15! Dare we say the home that has EVERYTHING?! Just imagine ... garage parking, two outdoor spaces, modern finishes, skyline views and an incredible location! Located in the heart of Francisville/Fairmount, Perkiomen St is perfectly situated just blocks from the best shops and restaurants Fairmount Ave has to offer as well as the newly completed Francisville Playground and minutes from Fairmount Park and the Schuylkill river. Pull right in to your private one car garage and enter the stylish foyer with full coat closet and half bath for convenience. Heading upstairs to the main living level, one is immediately struck by the hardwood flooring and abundance of natural light flooding in from either side. The open concept kitchen provides the ideal space for the chef of the house. Upgraded stainless steel appliances, designer cabinetry and expansive white quartz waterfall island creates a useful but stylish space. Finishing off this level is a quaint balcony off of the kitchen. Making ones way up the floating stairs, the next level has two generous bedrooms with built-in closet systems and a stylishly tiled full bath. The primary suite level is the perfect getaway with a large main room, fully built-in walk in closet, attached bath with expansive glass shower and dual sinks. Lastly, the roof deck provides unobstructed, jaw dropping skyline views as well as a built-in gas grill and comfortable sectional furniture! If you're looking for garage parking, two outdoor spaces, modern finishes, skyline views and an incredible location 1815 Perkiomen St #15 is a must see! Schedule an appointment today! Home is available February 1st, 2023.
815 Perkiomen St #15

title: Charming 2 Bed, 2 Full Bath in One of the Most Desirable Neighborhood!
description:
Tucked away on a quiet, tree-lined street in the heart of Queen Village sits a historic and charming 2 bed, 2 full bath in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in the city. A tiled foyer greets you as you enter the open living and dining room with hardwood floors through out and plenty of light. The spacious and bright kitchen is a perfect mix of cottage sensibility and function with its reclaimed wood shelving, white subway tile and butcher block counter tops. Backdoor leads to a cozy patio ideal for grilling and potted plants. Make your way upstairs where you’ll find the first of two large bedrooms plus a second-floor den with enough space to accommodate an additional entertainment room or perhaps a WFH office. A full bath and large closet for linens and additional storage round out this floor. The third floor features a primary suite with generous closet space, full 3-piece bath and a roof deck retreat for an evening with friends or quiet mornings with a cup of coffee. 516 Kauffman St is a commuter friendly home being close to public transportation and I95 and is steps away from neighborhood treasures like Shot Tower Coffee, Moon + Arrow, Bus Stop Boutique and Essene Market.
516 Kauffman St

title: Apartment for Rent in Historic Yardley
description:
Note: A prior ad had been marked as being spam. It was not. After discovering that it had been flagged, Craigslist was contacted and asked to investigate. If flagging occurs for any falsified reason, they will again be contacted.
Apartment for rent on S. Main Street, right in the heart of charming, historic Yardley. 916 Sq ft.  Maximum occupancy: one adult. Now showing and taking applications. Rent: $1,600.00 per month. Living room,  bedroom, full bath, kitchen, utility room (washer, dryer, dedicated hot water heater), dedicated HVAC unit for AC and heat, and a private deck.  Landlord pays for incoming cold water, sewer & trash service. Tenant pays own electricity which includes lighting, running electronics, heating their water (hot water heater), HVAC systems, etc., and any options such as cable, internet, phone, etc. Walking distance to shops, restaurants, Lake Afton, a Best of Phila Ice house, and 2 blocks to the Delaware Canal Tow Path. Convenient to several major cities and smaller towns, major shopping areas, universities, hospitals, and about ½ mile to the train station. Parking: one designated space per tenant on lot. No pets and no smoking-no exceptions. One year initial lease, converts to month to month thereafter. Security Deposit is equal to one month's rent and is required at signing along with first month's rent. An application fee of $100 is required and is due with the application. [If the tenant is approved, the application fee is applied toward the first month’s rent.] Positive references, adequate and dependable legal income, along with  favorable national background and credit checks are required.
Please email for more information or to set up an appointment to view. We ask that persons viewing the apartment please mask, as many viruses are circulating, including flu, RSV, and covid, however, we do not provide masks.
[We do not offer open houses or participate in voucher programs.]

title: Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital
description:
Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital, situated amongst the dining and community gathering spaces that make this neighborhood one of Philly's most desireable, is a gorgeous 3 story brick-front townhome. An open floor plan and wide layout greets you as you enter this sophisticated, light-filled open concept living/dining space. The space enjoys an abundance of natural light owing to two west facing windows. The contemporary style pairs neutral walls with rich dark hardwood floors, and cabinetry, and shows off a grand white Quartz island with a striking waterfall feature. If a glamorous kitchen is what you’re looking for, you will be pleased with the newly renovated custom chef’s kitchen which is designed with generous storage space, specialized knife, spice and kitchen-tool drawers as well as hidden panel built-in garbage and recycling storage. If creating a welcoming space for family and visitors is your goal, the oversized island seats 5 comfortably and is perfect for entertaining or for casual family meals in the kitchen. Stainless steel appliances include a counter depth, side-by-side refrigerator, a 5-burner gas range, range hood and a dishwasher designed to disappear behind a cabinet panel. The second level of the home features wainscoting in the hallway along with two bedrooms plus a shared 3-piece bathroom. Both bedrooms are spacious and feature hardwood floors and ample closets. The hall bath features a tub/shower combo, plus a modern vanity, matching mirror and ample storage closet. The third floor is the primary suite level with an open plan to include a den/home office, perfect for working from home, or also perfect to finish as a nursery for a growing family. This room is also finished with wainscoting for a unique look. The bedroom area features high ceilings, hardwood floors, two windows, a large french door style double closet and an additional single closet with built-in shelving/storage. The private primary bathroom has a bathtub along with a separate stall shower, vanity and a third storage closet. Need more living space or a bonus room? The fully finished lower level is the perfect bonus space which can be used as a family room, exercise room, or additional guest space. It also features a convenient powder room. The home also has a rear patio, perfect for a bistro table and BBQ grill. Add some planters and enjoy your private city garden. With a WalkScore of 96, this home is within a short stroll to amazing Graduate Hospital destinations. It's located blocks from Julian Abel park, Chester Arthur School and a short walk from the many neighborhood restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and grocery stores. Easy access to public transportation, South Street, nearby Rittenhouse Square, and the Schuylkill River Trail. Sorry, no pets. No smoking.
759 S 22nd St
